docs.name: National and international transport of foodstuffs by different means of transport rail road and inland waterways  from 2008 onwards  : Thousands of tonnes : Road transport  : International transport : Food products, beverages and tobacco : Estonia
docs.description:
The tables included in the subdomain 'Ancillary activities' (food_pd_aa) contain information on packaging and transport of foodstuffs as well as on research and development projects (R &D) related to food safety.
The data are derived data from existing tables of the database on the Eurostat website, except table 'Food_pd_aapac1' (Sold production and external trade of products used to package food and beverages).
For further information on the derived data, please refer to the ESMS files linked to the original tables (see 21.2 'Related Metadata'):
1. Data on 'National and international transport of foodstuffs by different means of transport
   (rail, road, inland waterways)': Table Food_pd_aatran1
    For 'Railway transport': see 'Railway transport measurement - goods':    rail_go_esms
    For 'Road transport': see 'Road freight transport measurement':    road_go_esms           
    For 'Inland waterways: 
    see 'Inland waterways transport measurement - good': iww_go_esms   
2.  Data on 'National road transport of foodstuffs, by distance': Table Food_pd_aatran2
      see 'Road freighrt transport measurement':    road_go_esms

3.  Data on 'Government expenditure on R&D projets related to Food safety' : Table Food_pd_aaexp
     see 'Government budget appropriations or outlays on R&D': gba_esms
Full metadata at: http://epp.eurostat.ec.europa.eu/cache/ITY_SDDS/EN/food_pd_aa_esms.htm
column_names: Date
Value

docs.name: GDP at current prices (US dollars) / Imports of goods and services - Liechtenstein
docs.description: The Economic Statistics Branch of the United Nations Statistics Division (UNSD) maintains and annually updates the National Accounts Main Aggregates database. It consists of a complete and consistent set of time series, from 1970 onwards, of the main National Accounts aggregates of all UN Members States and other territories in the world for which National Accounts information is available. Its contents are based on the official data reported to UNSD through the annual National Accounts Questionnaire, supplemented with data estimates for any years and countries with incomplete or inconsistent information.
column_names: Year
Value

docs.source_name: Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics
docs.name: Market Force and Work: Job Market - Population 10 years or older, employed, by occupation (main job) - Employees - Military and civil servants Federation Units - UF: Maranhao. Datatype: Relative
docs.description: The Database & Statistics Series Historical Series aims to disseminate to a diverse audience (government, private sector, academia, students, NGOs), information from official data come from surveys of IBGE, for the most part, and other government sources. Ordered according to a time interval, this information being Historical statistics are series, in many cases, long series (longer than 20 years). Such series are characterized by the nature of their socio-economic and demographic information and also for presenting the concepts of variables involved, as well as the changes it underwent over the period considered, in addition to notification, whenever appropriate, to methodological changes in the survey generating the data. The themes covered by the series Statistics & Historical Data gather a wealth of information on the Brazilian reality in its social (education, housing, work, health, family organization), demographic (population characteristics, population dynamics and demographic indicators) and economic ( system of national accounts, price indices, production and trade, agriculture), without excluding the data of recent years, covering periods as long as possible.
column_names: Date
Value

docs.name: Percentage of employees only enterprises with CVT courses participating in CVT courses by AGE GROUPS and size class  : Percentage of total : Less than 25 years : Malta : Total
docs.description:
CVTS2 and CVTS3 data were collected with reference year 1 1999 and 2005 and published by Eurostat in order to:
Provide the Commission with harmonised, reliable and relevant statistical information needed to define, implement, monitor and evaluate Commission policies in the continuing vocational training in enterprises sector.
Provide the EU institutions, national administrations, enterprises, professional associations and EU citizens with high quality statistical services and products in the field of training.
CVTS3 provides comparable statistics on training enterprises, the participation to training, the volume of CVT courses and its costs, and moreover information on Initial vocational training (IVT) courses.
CVTS2 provides comparable statistical results on training and non-training enterprises, the supply of and the demand for vocational skills, the need for CVT and the forms, content and volume of CVT, the use of enterprises' own training resources and of external providers, and the cost of CVT courses.
The CVTS1 was the first survey on continuing vocational training in enterprises carried out on the EU level in a co-ordinated form (outline questionnaire, common definitions, and common recommendations with the respect to the fieldwork). The survey therefore was of pioneering nature, and is not any longer disseminated.
Full metadata at: http://epp.eurostat.ec.europa.eu/cache/ITY_SDDS/EN/trng_cvts_esms.htm
column_names: Date
Value

docs.name: Population - Both Sexes / Age 42 / Total Areas - Northern Mariana Islands
docs.description: The United Nations Demographic Yearbook collects, compiles and disseminates official statistics on a wide range of topics. Data have been collected from national statistical authorities since 1948 through a set of questionnaires dispatched annually by the United Nations Statistics Division to over 230 national statistical offices. The Demographic Yearbook disseminates statistics on population size and composition, births, deaths, marriage and divorce on an annual basis. Demographic Yearbook special topics issues cover a wide range of additional topics including economic activity, educational attainment, household characteristics, housing, ethnicity and language, among others.
column_names: Year
Number

Provide the Commission with harmonised, reliable and relevant statistical information needed to define, implement, monitor and evaluate Commission policies in the continuing vocational training in enterprises sector.

CVTS3 provides comparable statistics on training enterprises, the participation to training, the volume of CVT courses and its costs, and moreover information on Initial vocational training (IVT) courses.
CVTS2 provides comparable statistical results on training and non-training enterprises, the supply of and the demand for vocational skills, the need for CVT and the forms, content and volume of CVT, the use of enterprises' own training resources and of external providers, and the cost of CVT courses.
The CVTS1 was the first survey on continuing vocational training in enterprises carried out on the EU level in a co-ordinated form (outline questionnaire, common definitions, and common recommendations with the respect to the fieldwork). The survey therefore was of pioneering nature, and is not any longer disseminated.

sources.description: The United Nations (UN) is an intergovernmental organization established on 24 October 1945 to promote international co-operation.
sources.name: United Nations

sources.description:
Eurostat's mission: to be the leading provider of high quality statistics on Europe. 

Eurostat is the statistical office of the European Union situated in Luxembourg. Its task is to provide the European Union with statistics at European level that enable comparisons between countries and regions.
sources.name: EuroStat

sources.description: France's National Institute of Statistics and Economic Studies (Institut National de la Statistique et des Études Économiques: INSEE) is a Directorate General of the Ministry of the Economy, Finance, and Industry. It is therefore a government agency whose personnel are government employees, although not all belong to the civil service. INSEE operates under government accounting rules: it receives its funding from the State's general budget.
sources.name: National Institute of Statistics and Economic Studies (France)

sources.description: The Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics - IBGE is the main provider of data and information in the country, serving the needs of different segments of civil society, as well as organs of federal, state and local government levels.

sources.description: The Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis was established in 1914, after the creation of the Federal Reserve System in 1913. The Eighth Federal Reserve District is headquartered in St. Louis and has branches in Little Rock, Ark., Louisville, Ky., and Memphis, Tenn.
